items.sentence: Put yourself in my position. What would you have done?
Tom broke off the conversation and turned to the door.
I told you you had to go home. Why are you still here?
I ran a red light in my car, because I was in a hurry.
I bought this book at the bookstore near the bus stop.
I'll set my alarm clock so I don't oversleep tomorrow.
They said on the radio that it would be cold tomorrow.
It would be wise to not to carry so much money on you.
A real friend will tell you when you're running rough.
Tom says he's planning to go to Australia next winter.
